title.rendered: 15 Common Writing Mistakes That English Language Learners Make (Infographic)

content.rendered: In this infographic we had a look at writing mistakes that ESL students and English learners commonly make. Are you familiar with any of these? Please let us know in the comments and share this infographic with your fellow English learners if you enjoy it. Thank you.

excerpt.rendered: In this infographic we had a look at writing mistakes that ESL students and English learners commonly make. Are you familiar with any of these? Please let us know in the comments and share this infographic with your fellow English learners if you enjoy it. Thank you.
